project.name: Hotel Reservation System
project.description: A hotel reservation web application where guests can book rooms without signing up. Admins can manage room and user details.
project.keywords: Hotel Reservation, Web Application, PHP, MySQL, Database Management

project.name: Student Activity Management
project.description: A credit-based mini project to track student activities and involvement. Developed during Semester 6.

project.name: Hand Written Digit Recognition
project.description: An AI-based project to recognize handwritten digits using machine learning and deep learning techniques.
project.keywords: AI, Machine Learning, Digit Recognition, Python

project.name: Trip Planner System
project.description: A web app to manage trip bookings, packages, and inquiries. Provides public access to view available packages.
project.keywords: Web Application, Trip Planner, Backend Management

project.name: Character Extraction from Visuals and Images using OpenCV
project.description: Major project for extracting characters from visuals and images using OpenCV, demonstrated at the Department Project Expo.

publication.name: Extraction of Character from Visual's and Image's using OpenCV
publication.author: Rashad H
publication.publisher: International Journal of Scientific Research in Computer Science, Engineering and Information Technology
publication.journalName: International Journal of Scientific Research in Computer Science, Engineering and Information Technology
